about_name.description: Name of the 'About' section, where users can see information about the extension

about_changeLog.description: Link to the extension's list of changes per release

about_sourceCode.description: Link to the extension's source code and its license type (MIT)

about_support.description: Link to the extension's support site

commandLockUnlockActiveTab.description: Description of keyboard shortcut to lock or unlock the active tab

commandWrangleCurrentTab.description: Description of keyboard shortcut to close and save the active tab
commandWrangleCurrentTab.message: 关闭并保存活动标签页

contextMenu_corralTab.description: Label for context menu item that closes the clicked tab and adds it to the corral
contextMenu_corralTab.message: 关闭标签页并保存网址

contextMenu_lockDomain.description: Label for context menu item that locks the domain of the clicked tab
contextMenu_lockDomain.message: 永不关闭此域名的标签页

contextMenu_lockSpecificDomain.description: Label for context menu item that locks the domain of the clicked tab
contextMenu_lockSpecificDomain.message: 永不关闭 $domain$ 的标签页

contextMenu_lockTab.description: Label for context menu item that locks the clicked tab

corral_currentSort.description: Button title for showing current sort order

corral_emptyList.description: Message displayed in the tab corral when the extension has not yet closed any tabs
corral_emptyList.message: 尚无已关闭的标签页。在 Tab Wrangler 关闭标签页后，标签页就会出现在这里。带来你的标签页吧！

corral_removeSelectedTabs.description: Button title for removing all selected tabs from the corral

corral_restoreSelectedTabs.description: Button title for restoring / re-opening all selected tabs from the corral

corral_searchResults_clear.description: Button title for clearing the search value and resetting results

corral_searchResults_label.description: Label showing number of tab search results

corral_searchTabs.description: Text input placeholder for searching list of closed tabs

corral_toggleAllTabs_deselectAll.description: Button title for deselecting all tabs in the tab corral

corral_toggleAllTabs_selectAll.description: Button title for selecting all tabs in the tab corral

extension_pause.description: Label for button that pauses the extension

extension_resume.description: Label for button that resumes (unpauses) the extension

options_dedupe_label.message: 防止“待用标签页”中记录重复的标签页：

options_dedupe_option_exactURLMatch.description: Label for option to de-duplicate when URL matches exactly

options_dedupe_option_exactURLMatch_desc.description: Description for option to de-duplicate when URL matches exactly
options_dedupe_option_exactURLMatch_desc.message: 在一个标签页被贮藏关闭时，它被添加到“待用标签页”列表。任何以前贮藏且有完全相同网址（URL）的标签页记录将被移除。

options_dedupe_option_exactURLMatch_labe.description: Extended label of the de-duplicate when tab URL matches exactly option

options_dedupe_option_hostnameAndTitleMa.description: Label for option to de-duplicate when hostname and page title match
options_dedupe_option_hostnameAndTitleMa.message: 主机名和页面标题匹配

options_dedupe_option_hostnameAndTitleMa.description: Extended description for option to de-duplicate when hostname and page title match
options_dedupe_option_hostnameAndTitleMa.message: 在一个标签页被贮藏关闭时，它被添加到“待用标签页”列表。任何以前贮藏且有相同主机名（域名）且页面标题相同的标签页记录将被移除。

options_dedupe_option_hostnameAndTitleMa.description: Extended label for option to de-duplicate when hostname and page title match
options_dedupe_option_hostnameAndTitleMa.message: 主机名和页面标题匹配

options_dedupe_option_withDupes_descript.description: Description of the never de-duplicating tabs option
options_dedupe_option_withDupes_descript.message: 在一个标签页被贮藏关闭时，它被添加到“待用标签页”列表。不会更改以前贮藏的标签页记录。

options_importExport_description.description: Description of the import/export feature shown next to import/export buttons
options_importExport_description.message: 导出已贮藏标签页相关的所有信息。这对于重新安装扩展前准备以恢复旧有状态相当有用。

options_importExport_export.description: Button label to begin exporting closed tabs

options_importExport_exporting.description: Label displayed when exporting closed tabs

options_importExport_import.description: Button label to begin importing closed tabs

options_importExport_importing.description: Label displayed when importing closed tabs

options_importExport_importWarning.description: Description of the destructiveness of importing; current tabs are overwritten
options_importExport_importWarning.message: 警告：导入数据将覆盖现有的数据，无法找回（除非您另有备份）。

options_name.description: Name of the 'Options' section, where users can configure the extension

options_option_autoLock_empty.description: Message shown when there are no whitelisted URLs
options_option_autoLock_empty.message: 尚无自动锁定的网址。使用上面的表单可以添加一些到白名单。

options_option_autoLock_example.description: Example describing how the whitelist works
options_option_autoLock_example.message: 例子："cnn" 可以匹配 "https://www.cnn.com" 的每个页面，或者任何网址（URL）含有 "cnn" 的页面。

options_option_autoLock_label.description: Label preceeding input for adding URL to whitelist
options_option_autoLock_label.message: 自动锁定网址（URL）包含如下字符串的标签页：

options_option_autoLock_remove.description: Button label for removing a URL from the whitelist

options_option_autoLock_urlHeader.description: Table column header for list of whitelisted URL strings

options_option_clearOnQuit_label.description: Label for checkbox to clear the tab list after quitting the Browser
options_option_clearOnQuit_label.message: 退出时清除已关闭标签页的列表

options_option_debounceOnActivated_label.description: Label for checkbox to reset a tab's timer only after it's active for 1 second
options_option_debounceOnActivated_label.message: 仅在标签页活动超过 1 秒后重置该标签页的计时器

options_option_startTimerOnFirstActive_l.description: Label for checkbox to only start timer on first activation
options_option_startTimerOnFirstActive_l.message: 仅在第一次激活时启动计时器

options_option_filterAudio_label.description: Label for checkbox to filter tabs that are playing audio
options_option_filterAudio_label.message: 不要关闭正在播放音频的标签页

options_option_filterGroupedTabs_label.description: Label for checkbox to lock tabs that are in a tab group
options_option_filterGroupedTabs_label.message: 不要关闭群组内的标签页

options_option_minTabs_tabs.description: Input title for minimum number of tabs
options_option_minTabs_tabs.message: 必须是一个大于或等于 0 的数字

options_option_rememberTabs_label.description: Label preceeding input for number of tabs to remember

options_option_rememberTabs_postLabel.description: Label following input for number of tabs to remember

options_option_rememberTabs_tabs.description: Input title for number of tabs to remember
options_option_rememberTabs_tabs.message: 必须是一个大于或等于 0 的数字

options_option_saveSortOrder.description: Label for toggling saving sort order in Corral and Lock Tabs

options_option_showBadgeCount_label.description: Label for checkbox to show a badge on the extension icon with number of tabs closed
options_option_showBadgeCount_label.message: 在工具栏按钮上显示已贮藏标签页的数量

options_option_theme_label.description: Label preceding button group for choosing the color theme

options_option_theme_dark.description: 'Dark' choice for color theme. Dark background, light font

options_option_theme_light.description: 'Light' choice for color theme. Light background, dark font

options_option_theme_system.description: 'System' choice for color theme. Uses the preferred color theme of user's OS.

options_option_timeInactive_label.description: Label preceeding inputs for setting inactive time before tabs are closed
options_option_timeInactive_label.message: 关闭不活动的标签页，如果超过：

options_option_timeInactive_minutes.description: Input title for number of minutes before closing tabs
options_option_timeInactive_minutes.message: 必须是一个大于 0 且小于 7200 的数字

options_option_timeInactive_seconds.description: Input title for number of seconds before closing tabs
options_option_timeInactive_seconds.message: 必须是一个大于 0 且小于 60 的数字

options_saving.description: Message displayed when options are being saved

options_section_autoLock.description: Header for the auto-lock section of the options tab

options_section_importExport.description: Header for the import/export feature section of the options tab

tabCorral_name.description: Name of the 'Tab Corral' feature, the list of tabs closed by the extension

tabLock_lockedReason_locked.description: Label for tab that is locked because the user locked it

tabLock_lockedReason_matches.description: Label for a tab that is locked because it matches the whitelist

tabLock_lockedReason_paused.description: Label for a tab when the extension is paused

tabLock_lockedReason_pinned.description: Label for a tab that is locked because it's pinned

tabLock_lockedReason_audible.description: Label for a tab that is locked because it's audible
tabLock_lockedReason_audible.message: 正在播放音频的标签页将不被关闭

tabLock_lockedReason_group.description: Label for a tab that is locked because it's in a group

tabLock_lockedReason_inactive.description: Label for a tab that is locked because it's inactive

tabLock_lockLabel.description: Explanation of the lock checkbox's functionality
tabLock_lockLabel.message: 选中一个标签页的复选框则锁定该标签页，避免自动关闭它。

tabLock_name.description: Name of the 'Tab Lock' feature, the list of open tabs with UI to lock them

tabLock_remainingTimeLabel.description: Explanation of time remaining before tab is closed

tabLock_sort_tabOrder.description: Description for sorting tabs by how they appear in browser

tabLock_sort_tabOrder_desc.description: Description for sorting tabs by how they appear in browser, in reverse

tabLock_sort_timeUntilClose.description: Description for sorting tabs by how much time until TW closes them

tabLock_sort_timeUntilClose_desc.description: Description for sorting tabs by how much time until TW closes them, in reverse

corral_tabsWrangledFull.description: Description of number of tabs wrangled by this extension

settings_setminTabs_error.description: Error shown when invalid min tabs setting is supplied.
settings_setminTabs_error.message: 最小标签页数量需大于或等于 0

settings_setminutesInactive_error.description: Error shown when invalid minutes inactive setting is supplied.
settings_setminutesInactive_error.message: 分钟无效，必须大于或等于 0

settings_setsecondsInactive_error.description: Error shown when invalid seconds inactive setting is supplied.
settings_setsecondsInactive_error.message: 秒数无效，必须大于或等于 0 且小于 60

corral_sortBy.description: Label prefixing sort order of the tab corral

corral_sortPageTitle.description: Label for sorting the tab corral list by page title

corral_sortPageTitle_short.description: Short label (for use in a narrow button) for sorting the tab corral list by page title

corral_sortPageTitle_descending.description: Label for sorting the tab corral list by page title in descending order

corral_sortPageTitle_descending_short.description: Short label (for use in a narrow button) for sorting the tab corral list by page title in descending order

corral_sortTimeClosed.description: Label for sorting the tab corral list by tab closed time

corral_sortTimeClosed_short.description: Short label (for use in a narrow button) for sorting the tab corral list by tab closed time

corral_sortTimeClosed_descending.description: Label for sorting the tab corral list by tab closed time in descending order

corral_sortTimeClosed_descending_short.description: Short label (for use in a narrow button) for sorting the tab corral list by tab closed time in descending order

corral_sortDomain.description: Label for sorting the tab corral list by domain

corral_sortDomain_short.description: Short label (for use in a narrow button) for sorting the tab corral list by domain

corral_sortDomain_descending.description: Label for sorting the tab corral list by domain in descending order

corral_sortDomain_descending_short.description: Short label (for use in a narrow button) for sorting the tab corral list by domain in descending order

extDescription.message: 自动关闭不常用的标签页，并允许您轻松还原找回它们

corral_tabSessionFresh.description: Tooltip describing why certain tabs will have their full session restored
corral_tabSessionFresh.message: 还原标签页将还原其会话，包含历史记录、滚动位置等。受浏览器功能所限，只能还原最近关闭的 25 个标签页。

corral_noTabsMatch.description: Message shown when no tabs match the user's search query
corral_noTabsMatch.message: 没有标签页匹配您的查询。尝试新查询，或缩减查询关键词。
